citeinfo.title: F_NotSampledReaches_W_B

descript.abstract: Layer used to track the outcome of all rejected reaches. Information includes reason why it was not sampled, any notes from the crew and information about who approved the rejections.
descript.purpose: Layer used to track the outcome of all rejected reaches. Information includes reason why it was not sampled, any notes from the crew and information about who approved the rejections.

idinfo.accconst: None, these data are considered public domain.
idinfo.useconst: These data are provided by Bureau of Land Management (BLM) "as is" and might contain errors or omissions. The User assumes the entire risk associated with its use of these data and bears all responsibility in determining whether these data are fit for the User's intended use. The information contained in these data is dynamic and may change over time. The data are not better than the sources from which they were derived, and both scale and accuracy may vary across the data set. These data might not have the accuracy, resolution, completeness, timeliness, or other characteristics appropriate for applications that potential users of the data may contemplate. The User is encouraged to carefully consider the content of the metadata file associated with these data. These data are neither legal documents nor land surveys, and must not be used as such. Official records may be referenced at most BLM offices. Please report any errors in the data to the BLM office from which it was obtained. The BLM should be cited as the data source in any products derived from these data. Any Users wishing to modify the data should describe the types of modifications they have performed. The User should not misrepresent the data, nor imply that changes made were approved or endorsed by BLM. This data may be updated by the BLM without notification.

idinfo.datacred: US Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management Assessment, Inventory, and Monitoring Project Team; NAMC

attracc.attraccr: Contact contributor of specific features for accuracy information

dataqual.logic: Data are related to the I_Indicators layer based upon the EvaluationID.
dataqual.complete: Contact contributor of specific features for accuracy information

horizpa.horizpar: Contact contributor of specific features for accuracy information

procstep.procdesc: Data were collected by trained field crews with the BLM and partner organizations. They followed the BLM core aquatic core and contingent indicators in TR 1735-2 (AIM National Aquatic Monitoring Framework: Field Protocol for Wadeable Lotic System). Pre-2021 data were captured electronically using the Stream And River Assessment Hub (SARAH), and 2021 and later data were collected using Survey123. They were managed by the data collectors, with oversight from BLM field offices, state offices, and the National Operations Center. This dataset has undergone rigorous QA/QC to ensure data quality.

cntaddr.address: BLM National Operations Center; Denver Federal Center,Building 50

enttyp.enttypd: Layer used to track the outcome of all rejected reaches. Information includes reason why it was not sampled, any notes from the crew and information about who approved the rejections.

attr.attrdef: Internal feature number.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Unique visit or evaluation identifier; PointID concatenated with the evaluation/ sampled date. If the reach was field evaluated, FieldEvalDate is used for the EvaluationID. If the reach was rejected in the office, OfficeEvalDate is used for the EvaluationID

attrdomv.udom: Unique visit or evaluation identifier; PointID concatenated with the evaluation/ sampled date. If the reach was field evaluated, FieldEvalDate is used for the EvaluationID. If the reach was rejected in the office, OfficeEvalDate is used for the EvaluationID

attr.attrdef: Unique location identifier; 2-3 letter prefix indicating the original stratum, followed by the stream order group, and 4-5 digit random code specifying the order the points were selected

attrdomv.udom: Unique location identifier; 2-3 letter prefix indicating the original stratum, followed by the stream order group, and 4-5 digit random code specifying the order the points were selected

attr.attrdef: Latitude of the rejected reach in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum. If a reach was rejected in the field, the crews coordinates are used. If the reach was rejected in the office, the design coordinates were used.

attrdomv.udom: Latitude of the rejected reach in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum. If a reach was rejected in the field, the crews coordinates are used. If the reach was rejected in the office, the design coordinates were used.

attr.attrdef: Longitude of the rejected reach in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum. If a reach was rejected in the field, the crews coordinates are used. If the reach was rejected in the office, the design coordinates were used.

attrdomv.udom: Longitude of the rejected reach in decimal degrees and WGS84 datum. If a reach was rejected in the field, the crews coordinates are used. If the reach was rejected in the office, the design coordinates were used.

attr.attrdef: Date the point or reach was office evaluated to determine if it could be sampled or not

attrdomv.udom: Date the point or reach was office evaluated to determine if it could be sampled or not

attr.attrdef: Date the point or reach was field evaluated to determine if it could be sampled or not

attrdomv.udom: Date the point or reach was evaluated to determine if it could be sampled or not

attr.attrdef: All NotSampled reaches have Final Eval Statuses of Not Sampled

attrdomv.udom: All NotSampled reaches have Final Eval Statuses of Not Sampled

attr.attrdef: All NotSampled reaches have a FieldEvalStatus of Not Sampled

attrdomv.udom: All NotSampled reaches have a FieldEvalStatus of Not Sampled

attr.attrdef: The reason why a particular reach was not sampled.

attrdomv.udom: The reason why a particular reach was not sampled.

attr.attrdef: Comments detailing why the ReasonNotSampled choice was selected

attrdomv.udom: Comments detailing why the ReasonNotSampled choice was selected

attr.attrdef: Comments from the crew on how they accessed the reach or how it should be accessed in the future.

attrdomv.udom: Comments from the crew on how they accessed the reach or how it should be accessed in the future.

attr.attrdef: Comments from the office evaluator detailing information such as how to access the reach, if it is likely to have water, ect.

attrdomv.udom: Comments from the office evaluator detailing information such as how to access the reach, if it is likely to have water, ect.

attr.attrdef: Not sampled rational #1. Required for office rejected points.

attrdomv.udom: Not sampled rational #1. Required for office rejected points.

attr.attrdef: Not sampled rational #2. Required for office rejected points.

attrdomv.udom: Not sampled rational #2. Required for office rejected points.

attr.attrdef: Name of the individual responsible for conducting office evaluations

attrdomv.udom: Name of the individual responsible for conducting office evaluations

attr.attrdef: BLM administrative state

attrdomv.udom: BLM administrative state

attr.attrdef: URL linking the sampled reaches to a web enabled index page displaying related photos and photo comments. Only available to internal users.

attrdomv.udom: URL linking the sampled reaches to a web enabled index page displaying related photos and photo comments. Only available to internal users.

attr.attrdef: A unique identifier for each row in each table

attrdomv.udom: A unique identifier for each row in each table

attr.attrdef: Unique visit identifier from NAMC. Generated at time of data collection by the iPad.

attrdomv.udom: Unique visit identifier from NAMC. Generated at time of data collection by the iPad.

attr.attrdef: Name of the user that created the data entry.

attrdomv.udom: Name of the user that created the data entry.

attr.attrdef: Date the data entry was created.

attrdomv.udom: Date the data entry was created.

attr.attrdef: Name of the user that last edited the data.

attrdomv.udom: Name of the user that last edited the data.

attr.attrdef: Date the data was last edited.

attrdomv.udom: Date the data was last edited.

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry.

attrdomv.udom: Coordinates defining the features.

overview.eaover: Entities are broad data types and attributes are specific AIM indicators collected at reaches across BLM lands for a variety of purposes.
